name: Riven
title: the Exile
shortBio: Once a swordmaster in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade and a warband of her own. However, on the Ionian front, Riven's faith in her homeland was tested and ultimately broken. Having severed all ties to the empire, she now seeks to find her place in a shattered world, even as rumors abound that Noxus itself has been reforged...

skins.name: Crimson Elite Riven
skins.description: Though officially listed as killed in action, the rogue operative with the broken blade harbors no regrets for abandoning her comrades in their most dire moment. A turncoat become mercenary, she operates in the outer limits of civil society, lending her blade to the highest bidder.

skins.name: Battle Bunny Riven
skins.description: Say “Hoppin' Mad” one more time. She dares you.

skins.name: Dragonblade Riven

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.description: One tale of the kingdoms tells of Riven, her sword forged in dragonfire, descending into an enemy enclave in the aftermath of battle. Slaying her foes and freeing their captives, she rampaged across the countryside, crushing any who would enslave the innocent.

skins.name: Arcade Riven

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 Arcade event.

skins.description: Riven's part-time job at an arcade mostly involved playing dance simulators after her manager went home. Digitally transported to Arcade World by even scarier bosses, she's now using her moves (and some gear from her favorite RPG) to tear up Veigar's regime, one enemy at a time.

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during a Worlds event.

skins.name: Dawnbringer Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: Born from swirling energies at the dawn of creation, Riven is the living embodiment of order in the cosmos. Fated to clash against the Nightbringer for all time, she awaits a day when her light will finally break his darkness.

skins.name: Pulsefire Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Pulsefire event.

skins.description: A worshipper of temporal purity, Riven knows there are many others who would rather see time manipulated in their favor. These heretics give her blade purpose—she can only find true solace in eliminating all who would disturb the natural order.

skins.name: Valiant Sword Riven
skins.description: Riven trained with Morgana in the arts of politics and war for many years, but where Riven walked the path of justice, Morgana envisioned a world ruled by the gods alone—ultimately defeating their master and assuming the title of empress. Now tasked with bringing her friend to heel, Riven must face Morgana in combat… or join her.

skins.name: Prestige Valiant Sword Riven
skins.description: Riven's destiny is greater than she knows. One day she will determine the fate of the heavens, land, and sea, and awaken the slumbering power of the dragon within her.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

skins.description: A brave warrior from an ancient land, Riven was ignobly cut down in the heat of battle thousands of years ago, her sword shattering in the process. Unable to find peace, she obsessively scours an otherworldly battlefield for pieces of her broken blade, possessed by a horrific darkness that guides her into oblivion.

skins.name: Sentinel Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinels event.

skins.description: Riven joins the Sentinels hoping to atone for her role in the Noxian invasion of Ionia. After fighting her way out of a rapidly destabilizing City of Noxus, she understands that her time may be fleeting. However, she believes her life is a small price to pay to make amends.

skins.name: Battle Bunny Prime Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Anima Squad event.

skins.description: Riven volunteered for what would eventually become Anima Squad after losing many comrades in the early days of the Primordian invasion. A string of victories later, she is famous: a war hero looked up to by all. ...So why has she suddenly vanished when the world needs her most?

skins.name: Prestige Valiant Sword Riven (2022)
skins.description: Riven's destiny is greater than she knows. One day she will determine the fate of the heavens, land, and sea, and awaken the slumbering power of the dragon within her.

skins.name: Broken Covenant Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Born an Aspirant, Riven had no doubts about the congregation's evils until she discovered Nocturne torturing and feeding Neverghaast to Cho'Gath. Despite being mortally wounded, she escaped with a prisoner, who turned her into a Neverghaast to save her life. Now an exile with an endless hunger, Riven fights to redeem herself and her corrupted family.

skins.name: Primal Ambush Riven

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: After a fierce bout with Vi left both her weapon and her confidence shattered, Riven was forced to return to her roots. Due to her unyielding bravery, even in the face of defeat, her community bestowed her with a powerful Wildstripe that reforges her blade in times of need. She trains tirelessly for the day that she can prove she's worthy of their gift.

passive.name: Runic Blade
passive.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

spells.name: Broken Wings
spells.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Riven dashes forward, dealing @FirstSlashDamage@ physical damage. She can Recast this Ability twice. The first Recast is the same as the original, but the second has a different effect:

Recast: Riven leaps forward and slams, dealing @FirstSlashDamage@ physical damage and Knocks Up nearby enemies for 0.75 seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Ki Burst
spells.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> for @Effect5Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Valor
spells.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
spells.dynamicDescription: Riven quickly dashes and gains <shield>@TotalShield@ Shield</shield> for 1.5 seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Blade of the Exile
spells.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy, granting her @BonusAD@ Attack Damage and increased range on damaging Abilities and Attacks for @Duration@ seconds. While active, she can Recast.

Recast: Riven fires a wind slash that deals between @MinDamage@ and @MaxDamage@ physical damage, based on their missing Health.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
